item.title: C# Note - 1
item.description: Prerequisites .Net Framework has been install to your PC or laptop Create simple .net project without Visual Studio Prerequisites The version of .Net Framework on your PC is 2.0+ or later Assume the path of .Net Frameowork is c:\Windows\Microsfot.Net\Frameowork\v2.0.50727 Simple C# project Create a proejct named csharp-project md csharp-project cd csharp-project md bin src echo.>csharp-project.proj echo.>src\helloworld.cs Open Project configuration csharp-project.proj with notepad <Project DefaultTargets = "Compile" xmlns="http://schemas.
